name: BTEX
description: BTEX is an ERC-20 token that adheres to full transparency standards on the Ethereum blockchain. Legally classified as a payment token/virtual currency under Estonian law, it is the core of the Blocktrade ecosystem. Designed to elevate user experience on the platform, BTEX offers various perks and benefits through a gamified Rewards Program that operates on a level-based system. BTEX will also play a role outside of the Blocktrade platform. The token will serve as in-game currency outside of Blocktrade and as a payment option within the Blocktrade partner ecosystem.
